info.title: Just-In-Time Calls
info.description: JIT processing is a common practice in manufacturing industries for efficient demand-driven production and logistics across supply chains. Just-In-Time Supply to Customer covers JIT processes from the perspective of a supplier. This service enables you to read, create, and update JIT calls. For example, you can use this service to create a JIT call or to allocate or delete component materials.

x-sap-shortText: Create, read, and update Just-in-Time (JIT) call details in an SAP S/4HANA Cloud system using this inbound synchronous service

values.text: Logistics - Just In Time Inbound Integration(SAP_COM_0168)
